      • add

        public ClassPath add(String name,
            Location<?> location)
        Description copied from interface: ClassPath
        Add the specified element to this classpath. When using this method, the local and remote locations are assumed to be the same.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ClassPath
        Parameters:
        name - the the name of the element to add.
        location - the location of the element to add.
        Returns:
        this ClassPath.

      • add

        public ClassPath add(String name,
            Location<?> localLocation,
            Location<?> remoteLocation)
        Description copied from interface: ClassPath
        Add the specified element to this classpath. Upon processing by the node, the local location will be copied into the remote location.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ClassPath
        Parameters:
        name - the the name of the element to add.
        localLocation - the location of the element to add, in the client environment.
        remoteLocation - the location of the element to add, in the node environment.
        Returns:
        this ClassPath.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Description copied from interface: ClassPath
        Determine whether this classpath is empty.
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface ClassPath
        Returns:
        true if this classpath has no element, false otherwise.

      • isForceClassLoaderReset

        public boolean isForceClassLoaderReset()
        Description copied from interface: ClassPath
        Determine whether the node should force a reset of the class loader before executing the tasks.

        This only applies when this classpath is empty. If it is not empty, then the reset will occur regardless the value of this flag.

        Specified by:
        isForceClassLoaderReset in interface ClassPath
        Returns:
        true if the class loader reset should be forced, false otherwise.

      • setForceClassLoaderReset

        public void setForceClassLoaderReset(boolean forceClassLoaderReset)
        Description copied from interface: ClassPath
        Specify whether the node should force a reset of the class loader before executing the tasks.

        This only applies when this classpath is empty. If it is not empty, then the reset will occur regardless the value of the specified flag.

        Specified by:
        setForceClassLoaderReset in interface ClassPath
        Parameters:
        forceClassLoaderReset - true if the class loader reset should be forced, false otherwise.
